title: Looking 4 Duo (Support) Diamond +
body: Hello to supports that read this. I am particularly interested in a strongly mechanical support who has a good amount of experience near Master elo hopefully. Someone who can hold his own, and basically a support who can make big plays often. My IGN is "Commando" and would really like to find a partner to have fun and climb together. I feel I strong mechanical ADC so that is why desire support of similar strengths. My available times usually 4-8 PM weekdays and all weekend from Friday - Sunday.
